strongs_def: to be (or make) clean (literally or figuratively); by implication (in an adverse sense) to be bare, i.e. extirpated
kjv_def: acquit [idiom] at all, [idiom] altogether, be blameless, cleanse, (be) clear(-ing), cut off, be desolate, be free, be (hold) guiltless, be (hold) innocent, [idiom] by no means, be quit, be (leave) unpunished, [idiom] utterly, [idiom] wholly.
